__e: You have got to leave, Papa.
It's not the day you run away from love.
You may have run away from your country, but I'm not running away from mine.
Well, we were running from whatever it was that got Morgan.
You're running away from the fact that you alone can create your own happiness.
I think any man that'd do that is a man who'd skip town.
Now we're running away from you.
I'll tell her that we have to stay together.
And if it is a good plan, we're both going.
I would escape, look for you, and we'd leave together.
I am bursting at the seams to tell everyone we're eloping.
So you're suggesting he escapes a maximum-security prison, knowing full well that you'd catch him, just so he could trick you into letting him out again?
All the places you could run, you go to my wife?
You try to run again, we're going to kill you.
Try to run, I'll be after you and so will they.
I've got an even better one-- first I'll kill you, then I escape... then I rule the world.
If they catch us, I escape, and I find you.
I HAVE TO BE DOWNTOWN IN 20 MINUTES, OTHERWISE MY WHOLE DAY IS SHOT,
